original_title: Janis Joplin : Piece Of My Heart - Live Woodstock
overview: Performance video which includes:  Try (Just a Little Bit Harder),  To Love Somebody,  Work Me Lord,  Ball and Chain,  Piece of My Heart,  Combination of the Two,  Cry Baby,  Tell Mama,  Move Over, and  Kozmic Blues
title: Janis Joplin : Piece Of My Heart - Live Woodstock
